descriptionHtml:
Bob's Mountainside Brewery Player Home
version 0.91(beta)

Description:
This is my first Skyrim mod. Before downloading, please read the feature, future updates, and bug lists below. If you discover any issues please leave a comment briefly describing the issue.

Location: See the screenshot of the map. Use the two fast travel points on the map. They are located north of helgan, on the north side of the lake.

Features
- Brewery doubles as a player house
- Secure place to store items, all chests inside the brewery are player owned
- Chests will not be altered in future releases, so it is safe to store items between mod updates.
- Custom mead! Mountside Mead, which gives +15 to carry weight for 1 hour. This should keep you drinking!
- Mountainside Mead can be made using the cooking pots(see screenshot for recipe)
- Two fast travel points on the map, player house and dock merchant
- Quick access from the main entrance to all crafting nodes, including a wood chopping block
- Quick access from the main entrance to plenty of storage in the armory
- Storage includes display cases, mannequins, weapon/shield plaques and more
- Two Khajiit guards that double as followers, one in the brewery and one at the docks
- Two Khajiit merchants, one in the brewery and one at the docks
- Bedroom has a shower with a mudcrab shower buddy
- Lots of nice scenic areas inside and out.
- Threw a few weapons and armor in the armory chests, nothing godly.
- Rooms include kitchen, armory, bedroom, crafting room, library and plenty of other places to sit down.

Future Updates
- May add a custom mead logo to the actual mead bottle
- Kitchen and fridge will resupply automatically with minor things like mead or cooking ingredients

Minor Bugs
- A few lighting issues, not many left
- The female Khajiit voices do not work by default as followers, so temporarily they use a non-khajiit voice until I find a fix.
- The two merchants and two guards may use the throw voice shout insults. It's a bug, so don't take it personnally when they call you a skeever's butt.
- AI navigation needs some improvements. I think I was to light on the navmesh.
- Some of the walls need a little shifting to get rid of the noticable overlap

Bug Fixes and Revisions
0.90 Released
0.91 Fixed many lighting problems, wall alignment issues, added craftable mead recipe
author: Bob the Burrito
